tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FaceRecognitionMetrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_url TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    detected_faces INT,
    correct_recognition INT,
    accuracy DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE FaceRecognitionMetrics (
  metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  recognized_faces INT,
  unrecognized_faces INT
)

CREATE TABLE FaceRecognitionLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  image_path TEXT,
  recognized_face_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE FacialRecognitionSystemMetrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_name VARCHAR,
    date_time TIMESTAMP,
    accuracy FLOAT,
    detection_time FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE EmployeeInformation (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR,
    department VARCHAR,
    hire_date DATE,
    position VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE PerformanceHistory (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date TIMESTAMP,
    system_id INT,
    accuracy FLOAT,
    detection_time FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE SystemConfiguration (
    config_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_name VARCHAR,
    algorithm VARCHAR,
    threshold FLOAT,
    active BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE Facial_Recognition_Performance_Metrics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  accuracy FLOAT,
  precision FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Image_Data (
  image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  image_name VARCHAR(100),
  image_blob BYTEA,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE User_Records (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE Performance_Logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  operation VARCHAR(50),
  message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE System_Health (
  health_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  cpu_usage FLOAT,
  memory_usage FLOAT
)
